headline: Tracking Ole Andreas Halvorsen's Viking Global Portfolio - Q3 2024 Update
summary: Viking Global's 13F portfolio value increases to $27.44B with top holdings in U.S. Bancorp, Adobe, Apple, Philip Morris, and Visa. Check out the holdings in Q3.

headline: MetLife Partners With Workday to Enhance Employer Benefit Programs
summary: MET collaborates with Workday to optimize employer benefit programs according to employee preferences.

headline: DISA Completes Workday Design Badge Integration
summary: DISA Global Solutions, a Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY) partner, today announced that it has achieved Workday Design Approved Integration status. This integration provides joint customers with a streamlined integration that connects DISA's comprehensive employee screening and compliance solutions with Workday Human Capital Management (HCM) .

raw.headline: DISA Completes Workday Design Badge Integration
